attributes.action: Force British Telecom as the landline monopoly holder to enable ADSL broadband to all British subscribers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many 'not spots' where the BT ADSL signal does not reach the subscriber due to line lengths from exchanges and other factors. The Government promised that all UK subscribers would be enabled a few years ago. BT's claims that 99.9% have been enabled is not correct and many are left behind in this key modern necessity. The Government should press BT to enable every household and community

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Force British Telecom as the landline monopoly holder to enable ADSL broadband to all British subscribers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14717.asp

Prime Minister's Office
